name: thrift

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Software framework for scalable cross-language services development.
Thrift combines a software stack with a code generation engine to build
services that work efficiently and seamlessly between C++, Java, Python,
PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js,
Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and other languages.

dependencies.name: ant
dependencies.description:
Apache Ant is a Java library and command-line tool whose mission is to
drive processes described in build files as targets and extension points
dependent upon each other

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: bison
dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: flex
dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependencies.name: libevent
dependencies.description:
The libevent API provides a mechanism to execute a callback function
when a specific event occurs on a file descriptor or after a timeout has
been reached. Furthermore, libevent also support callbacks due to
signals or regular timeouts.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: py-pure-sasl
dependencies.description:
This package provides a reasonably high-level SASL client written in
pure Python. New mechanisms may be integrated easily, but by default,
support for PLAIN, ANONYMOUS, EXTERNAL, CRAM-MD5, DIGEST-MD5, and GSSAPI
are provided.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-six
dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-twisted
dependencies.description: An asynchronous networking framework written in Python

dependencies.name: py-zope-interface
dependencies.description:
This package provides an implementation of "object interfaces" for
Python. Interfaces are a mechanism for labeling objects as conforming to
a given API or contract. So, this package can be considered as
implementation of the Design By Contract methodology support in Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: scons
dependencies.description: SCons is a software construction tool

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: parquet-format
dependent_to.description: ParquetFormat is a columnar storage format that supports nested data.

dependent_to.name: parquet-cpp
dependent_to.description: C++ bindings for the Apache Parquet columnar data format.

dependent_to.name: arrow
dependent_to.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the C++ bindings.
